summary: A tutorial that guides everyone to upgrade "Arissa - The Wandering Rogue" from 1.3 to 2.x without losing progress.
descriptionHtml:
"Arissa - The Wandering Rogue" is a good follower mod. The upgrade from 1.3 to 2.x causes some of this mod lovers have to replay the quest.
Yes, you can do this if you love it so much. But to lazy guy like me, I would love to keep my progress as I've spent many time to play with this follower.
Here is the guideline to upgrade "Arissa - The Wandering Rogue" from 1.3 to 2.x without losing progress.

[size=5]Credits[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53754/]Arissa - The Wandering Rogue[/url] by [b]Chesko[/b], [b]griefmyst[/b] and their team members
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27119/?]TESV ESS Files Editor[/url] by [b]fubrus[/b] 


[size=5]Tutorial[/size]
1) !!!BACK UP YOUR SAVE FILE!!!
[list=1]

[/list]2) Download TESV ESP Files Editor
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27119/?
[img width=422,height=168]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/ilIjWO4KU7vOpD4BYttRlhKo178MidON85rxyAnHbHq_VO16diNav9MQp94nwMeIra8yhE2zg4g01f2xqIdQTUvC8K7ZtyeTXi1zaq_I3QS_AUCXh88jDsA2_5AEnx-_A8Sm-9o2[/img]

3) Open TESV ESP Files Editor and click “Open”
[img width=602,height=300]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/_3uYPgSXp8ypPqQQAt-vCYyRRjI4hJtbnfgqXJFM1B470_I8hnctmdS7oOu4A4fN4g2QER9W51CL2xBl15WTNOfgNmjkrLejHEjbzj-fgTvfw1HgSeEipSRgvDT88vUj3VlxWOtM[/img]

4) Select the save file which you want to modify
[img width=425,height=221]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/t2o6QTPF5395G_LXO5XCOo9QVTAQ1J3RCoUrWGTx2rXYt6PB0sCcCeokQlfME6U9QX6fngfgH_3lEuiZncTyK3vEuSuWwC6vgcx5UEZe1mvlseVoDat7V-XEcwCLNuRzeuYsCRZ0[/img]

5) Expand “Plugin info” -> “plugins” and select “CompanionArissa.esp”
[img width=602,height=300]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/k_Hf8vJzL6E44g7wy9lzXVYjGpdxCzjZpF7hFemXbShQ6OEcEciMp_GiBC76L-0Z3b2sMtDRQxK50aQqv5TAuHLulVlDc-_NE1T_ogAfBNGQdvyFc0LPteC8ESq5glWlx-FTNZNu[/img]
6) Modify the “CompanionArissa.esp” in the right text box to “CompanionArissa.esm” and click on any plugin name on left menu, you will see “CompanionArissa.esp” has already renamed to “CompanionArissa.esm”
[img width=602,height=301]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/iG9oHw1s5IwYlP2d6uUDJ6WTA5HOP8TJVDh-G5JqLCzApZqNxtBDPuLrvglgnpwWCUcOoiTVMWBqW6fV4dnnQghYzdWu40381CsTe6IX8vpFZi4OTB7TLLGwwE7Zmb_4wDWhctAx[/img]

7) Click “Save” -> “Normal” and give the save file a name
[img width=406,height=380]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/VqiL16B5JLXUiRLgwhFavHINE5W7RPGe8Gh9_7OwSdXxlXyYy1p4-xrDLYrrMRL3rDampSg3zqOkajhBVj-qHZAL60rNFBQW3uSvKoz0gAgT9lcrgFCuOMctPJ4yLkfEa2Yz_mrb[/img]
8) Remove Arissa 1.3 plugin and install Arissa 2.x plugin. Don’t forget to make your Arissa plugin to follow the same order as 1.3. Now, enjoy the game!
author: shuryanc
